A virtual private network (VPN) extends a private network across a public network, and enables users to send and receive data across shared or public networks as if their computing devices were directly connected to the private network. check digit > 通常係check 身份證 用algorithm
field presence check > input 唔可以留空
type check > 睇下input type係咩 例如打數字去名到
length check > 照字面解 例如電話number 一定要8個字
fixed value check > check 固定數值既野 例如性別只可填男女
format check > 例如日期/ email呢d 冇@或者唔係跟dd-mm-yyyy就有error
range check > 睇input係咪within 個合理既range入面 例如價錢唔可以係負數 還書日期唔可以早過借書日期
